ppy/osu-framework.summary: The osu-framework repository has seen recent activity with multiple pull requests. These include adding native macOS image loading support, which improves texture loading time significantly, cleaning up Objective-C interop code by reorganizing methods and using more convenient constructors, and adding linux-arm64 build support for FFmpeg, enhancing cross-compiling capabilities.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu-wiki repository has experienced updates related to the MWC 7K 2025 tournament. Changes include updating team listings, rules, and adding a full player list link. These adjustments aim to reflect the latest information and preparations for the tournament, ensuring the wiki remains a current and reliable source for osu! community events.
